RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 52. Claiming Purse 16100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE AUGUST 30, 2022. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Claiming Races For $5,000 O r Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHEZA FINE JUSTICE prompted the pace throughout, alternated on lead to deep stretch and roused to prevail on the wire in the late stages. BEEBLEGEE off rail run to turn, garnered a short lead past eighth pole from inside but wore down to the wire while well clear of the rest. SHADY BABY quick between horses to the front but weakened in the stretch run. LA LA ANGEL never menaced throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Sheza Fine Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace throughout, alternated on lead, prevailed on wire

ENTRY.NAME: Shady Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick between horses to the front, weakened in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: La La Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Beeblegee
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail run to turn, short lead past eighth pole, wore down wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 57. Maiden Claiming Purse 9000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SMART DRESSER dueled inside past quarter pole, dug in gamely through the stretch run to edge clear in a good effort. WILDERZAR chased from three wide to the turn, dueled in the stretch and grinded away for the place spot while best of the rest. ALY STONE had an awkward start, ran on in the stretch for show spot. GUS GUS raced along evenly with no response when needed. HICKORY BILL inside chase to the turn, gave in readily stretch run. LET'S GO JOHN broke awkwardly from the gate while never a menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Hickory Bill
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside chase to the turn, gave in readily stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Aly Stone
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, ran on in the stretch for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Smart Dresser
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC Hertrich III Frederick and Fielding John D
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside past quarter pole, dug in gamely to edge clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Fred W. Hertrich lll & John D. Fielding

ENTRY.NAME: Let's Go John
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke awkwardly from the gate while never a menace

ENTRY.NAME: Gus Gus
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Wilderzar
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased from three wide to the turn, dueled stretch, grinded away

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 55. Claiming Purse 17500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since July 30, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Preferenc e To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $10,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROLLIN SO PERFECT broke in a tangle with no speed to stretch, rallied in earnest up the inside through the stretch run to be along in time with an a gallant effort to prevail. PECKS NOT BAD no hurry from the gate, ran on widest in the drive to just miss. TEQUILA FLATS inside chase throughout, dueled into stretch, gave in late. WHISKEY HELPS chased to pair to deep stretch, weakened final furlong. MIXTER JENSEN broke sharp from outside to lead, cleared into stretch, stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Tequila Flats
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside chase throughout, dueled into stretch, gave in late

ENTRY.NAME: Rollin So Perfect
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke awkward with no speed to stretch, rallied in earnest inside

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Helps
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased to pair to deep stretch, weakened final furlong

ENTRY.NAME: Pecks Not Bad
ENTRY.OWNER: Barker Scott W and Barker Carol
ENTRY.COMMENT: no hurry from the gate, ran on widest in the drive to just miss

ENTRY.NAME: Mixter Jensen
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp from outside to lead, cleared into stretch, stopped

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 30, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred) .
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SLOAN STREET saved ground to far turn, angled out for clear run and rallied along to prevail at the wire. HARDLY MISCHIEVOUS unhurried early, off rail into far turn, rushed to lead but outgamed in the final furlong. YOU'RE A DANDY chased leader to the half with a short lead to far turn but gave in late. SOPHISTICATED raced along evenly, shuffled back inside into far turn with no late gain. TWITTER TRAFFIC inside speed, dueled to the half and stopped badly through the stretch run. MAMITA LINDA never factored throughout while widest throughout. LA CHAPEAU good position to far turn while stopping badly in the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Hardly Mischievous
ENTRY.OWNER: Ten Strike Racing and Cory Moelis Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, off rail into far turn, rushed to lead outgamed

ENTRY.NAME: Sophisticated
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly, shuffled back inside into far turn no gain

ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, dueled to the half and stopped badly stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: La Chapeau
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to far turn while stopping badly in the stretch run

ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to far turn, angled out for clear run, prevailed

RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHAKA'S LYRIC tracked top pair to turn, rallied in the final furlong to clear. SHEZ IN A TIZZY speed between horses, dueled to the stretch, outgamed in late while no match. TWILIGHT BEAUTY speed from inside to deep stretch faltered go late for show spot. MOTOWN HARBOR slight hop from the gate and never close thereafter. SHOW KITTEN never factored throughout.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: FANCIFUL inside duel to the turn, shook free to go well clear as much the best. TWISTED JUSTICE pressed winner early on, took up chase, no match. DANZANITEAWAY unhurried to the turn, rallied along in the stretch for show spot. SPOOKY LITTLE GIRL chased to pair to the stretch, faltered in the late going. PRIDE AND ATTITUDE slow from the gate and never menaced throughout.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 1 1/16M Turf CR: 83. Claiming Purse 13100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since July 30, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $7 ,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and a Sixteenth.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUM KINDA PRETTY sprinted quickly to the front from outside, well managed to stay clear with stout handling to the wire. OFF THE CHARTS between horses to the half, rallied three wide stretch for place. ON A TOUR inside run first turn, raced along evenly throughout for show spot. NEVERSAYNOLETSGO no hurry from the gate, lagged back to far turn, passed a couple. PRINCESS NINA inside trip tracking leader with nothing left in the stretch run. YOGURT chased to the half with a steady fade from that point.

ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run first turn, raced along evenly thruout for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Off the Charts
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses to the half, rallied three wide stretch for place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 74. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VOTARY settled to the turn, shuffled back with a three wide run into the stretch while kept to task, ridden out to the wire in a good effort. ITSABLINGTHING rushed quick from the gate, chased inside, shuffled back into turn, angled out with a wide run to come back in the final furlong for place spot while no match for winner. HAZANNE chased pace to the stretch but weakened late for show spot. MAGGIE E saved ground throughout with no late kick when needed. BIG DIG no speed to the stretch, passed a couple in the late going. FLAT OUT FAY quick speed from outside with a steady fade from the turn. CANCERFREE KIDS broke tardy from the gate, rushed to the turn but used up and dropped far back readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Maggie E
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground throughout with no late kick when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Big Dig
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the stretch, passed a couple late going

ENTRY.NAME: Itsablingthing
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick from the gate, chased inside, shuffled back turn, wide run

ENTRY.NAME: Cancerfree Kids
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke tardy, rushed to the turn, could not keep up and faded back

ENTRY.NAME: Votary
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled to the turn, shuffled back with a wide run, kept to task
